snippet: The price is said to be $39 million for the app that competes with Pandora and others in making customized playlists of recommended songs.
abstract: Google announces that it has purchased Songza, three-year-old app that competes with Pandora and other music streaming services; price is not disclosed but Google is said to have paid more than $39 million in deal.
lead_paragraph: The price is said to be $39 million for the app that competes with Pandora and others in making customized playlists of recommended songs.

headline.main: Google in Deal for Songza, a Music Playlist Service
headline.print_headline: Google in Deal for Songza, a Music Playlist Service
